FAQ.title: Got Questions? We've Got Answers
FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know about finding student jobs on EtudiantZ

items.question: How do I create my profile?
items.answer: Creating your profile is simple! Click on 'Sign Up', enter your email and basic information, then upload or scan your CV. Our AI will help you optimize it to stand out to employers. The whole process takes less than 5 minutes.

items.question: Is EtudiantZ really free for students?
items.answer: Yes, absolutely! EtudiantZ is 100% free for students. You can create your profile, browse jobs, apply to positions, and manage your schedule without any cost. We believe every student deserves access to quality job opportunities.

items.question: How does the matching system work?
items.answer: Our smart matching algorithm analyzes your profile, availability, location, and preferences to show you the most relevant job opportunities. You'll only see jobs that fit your schedule and match your skills, saving you time and increasing your chances of getting hired.

items.question: Can I apply to multiple jobs at once?
items.answer: Yes! Once your profile is complete, you can apply to multiple jobs with just one click. No need to fill out the same information over and over. Your profile information is automatically sent to employers when you apply.

items.question: How quickly do employers respond?
items.answer: Most employers on our platform respond within 48 hours. You'll receive notifications via email and in your dashboard when an employer views your application or wants to schedule an interview. You can track all your applications in real-time.

items.question: What if I need to change my availability?
items.answer: You can update your availability anytime in your profile settings. The system will automatically adjust which jobs are shown to you. If you're already working, you can also coordinate schedule changes directly with your employer through the platform.

items.question: Do I need work experience to find a job?
items.answer: Not at all! Many employers on EtudiantZ specifically look for students without experience. We have opportunities for first-time workers as well as positions for students with experience. Just be honest in your profile and highlight your skills and motivation.

items.question: How do I get paid?
items.answer: Payment arrangements are made directly with your employer. During the interview or job offer, you'll discuss payment terms, frequency, and method. EtudiantZ helps you find the job and manage your schedule, but employment contracts and payments are handled between you and your employer.
